release.action: More customizations for netbeans.module.dep dependency property.
Added maven.nbm.modulename property to allow customization of the netbeans module name. Previously the pom.package value was taken automatically. That values stays the default.

Instead of selectively including items into NBM, include everything under ${maven.nbm.build.dir}/${maven.nbm.cluster.dir} Allows adding custom files into the nbm, in pregoals of nbm:prepare-nbm-resources.
Upgraded to latest artifact plugin dependency, to make it work with Maven RC4.

release.action: Upgraded to latest nbantext dependency snapshot (as of 2004/06/11).

release.description: First release for the upcoming 4.0 version of Netbeans.
release.action: Added property maven.nbm.license.name to use when building the nbm.
Under certain conditions, Class-Path manifest attribute appeared multiple times in the jar. Fixed.
Refactored goals, allowing more customizations by projects.
Initial release, allows to enhance the jar's manifest with Netbeans specific entries, creates nbm file.
